descriptors.fluency_coherence: Fluent with only very occasional repetition. Hesitation may occur mid-sentence but won't affect coherence.
descriptors.pronunciation: Wide range of phonological features. Can sustain appropriate rhythm with occasional lapses.
descriptors.lexical_resource: Resource flexibly used. Some ability to use less common and idiomatic items.
descriptors.grammatical_range_accuracy: Range of structures flexibly used. Error-free sentences frequent.

feedback.fluency_coherence: Excellent fluency. Speech flows naturally with minimal hesitation.
feedback.pronunciation: Clear pronunciation. Speech is easily understood with consistent clarity.
feedback.lexical_resource: Adequate vocabulary. Can discuss topics at length. 2 word choice errors noted.
feedback.grammatical_range_accuracy: Excellent grammar. Wide range of structures used accurately. 3 minor errors detected.
feedback.overall_recommendation: Good overall performance. Minor areas for refinement in accuracy and range.

action_plan.instruction: Replace filler words with silent pauses under 300 ms.
